channel.title: Thieve leveling
channel.description:
okay uhm When ever on my server somone levels there thieving they get this error in the client:
[IMG]http://i360.photobucket.com/albums/oo45/owner_sexy/error1.jpg[/img]
Its only when somone levels. You can get exp fine just perfect but when you level boom client error and crash. I have spent hours and hours trying to figure this out. raped by who tried to help me for a long time too but we couldnt figure out :\ so please if anyone knows whats wrong help me :confused: :confused:

item.title: Thieve leveling
item.dc:creator: @karahan101 karahan101
item.description:
@karahan101 wrote:

thanks i am lookin for the case now :s if you know it that would be helpfull too but if not ill try to find it thanks alot

Read full topic

item.title: Thieve leveling
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright, there is a case for leveling a skill. It should say something like showinterface or something along that line, just take that out and it will fix that problem. Most people have this glitch because they did not use the correct ID’s for the theiv lvling interface. All you would do is remove that and it will fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Thieve leveling
item.dc:creator: @karahan101 karahan101
item.description:
@karahan101 wrote:

pillowscape:

its kinda a last resort but you can try to delete all the shit in the client form your comp and then re download the source unless its been happening since you got it then you should try out a new source.

yes this has been happining ever since i got the source but theres no way im leaving it now i put too much in -.- there has to be a way to fix it…

Can anyone helpppp meeeeee???!?!

EDIT: I did a test with the newest source of the kind i have and it works on that source so i tried the client but still messed up so its in the server files :\ has anyone ever got this before?

Read full topic
